summary: Improved version of the Flaming Familiar. Its duration is now 30 seconds and only explodes when killed and much more.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]IMPROVED FLAMING FAMILIAR[/b][/center][center][size=2]Version 1.1[/size][/center]
[b]INTRODUCTION[/b]
Well, this is my first mod that I'm publishing. Months ago I made a thread in the forum asking to do this mod, but unsuccessfully. So I learned to use the CK and made myself...

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
This mod is an improved version of the Flaming Familiar. Its main features are:
Common features:
[list][*] Duration of 30 seconds (60 seconds with Atromancy perk);
[*] Only explode when killed (unsummon like summoned atronachs when the time ends);
[*] Dual Cast ability (extends its duration);
[*] Reduced the casting range of 100 to 24 ft (increases with Summoner perk);
[*] Flame cloak (like Flame Atronach);
[*] 100% resistance to fire;
[*] 25% weakness to frost;
[*] [b]new![/b] Elemental Potency perk effect (50% more powerful);
[*] [b]new![/b] Its bite has fire damage (like Flame Atronach);[/list]
Flaming Familiar (without Elemental Potency perk):
[list][*] Level 10;
[*] 140 health points;[/list]
Potent Flaming Familiar (with Elemental Potency perk):
[list][*] Level 17;
[*] 210 health points;
[*] 10% resistance to magic;
[*] Health recovery (out of combat);
[*] +10 unarmed damage;[/list]
[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
Extract the files into the DATA folder (SKYRIM->DATA).

[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b]
Remove these files manually :
[list][*] Improved Flaming Familiar.esp;
[*] FlamingFamiliarUnsummon.pex;
[*] FlamingFamiliarUnsummon.psc;[/list]
[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
Last update.

[b]KNOWN ISSUES[/b]
None as I know. If you find any, let me know.

[b]CONFLICTS[/b]
Will conflict with any mod that changes this spell.

[b]NOTES[/b]
[list][*] This mod is like lowkey1979's Better Flaming Familiar, but isn't a copy. I made from scratch;
[*] I changed some IDs (Editor IDs) for better identification in CK;[/list]
[b]PERMISSIONS[/b]
You are free to change/modify this mod. But anyway, let me know please.

Questions, comments or suggestions are welcome.
